channel.title: Euro on Blog of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in Euro on Blog of Kai

item.title: Special issue of Euro 2020: England vs Italy
item.description: Live blogs Minute 1: After the final The UK prime minister and the Football Association have condemned racist abuse aimed at England’s Jadon Sancho, Marcus Rashford and Bukayo Saka after the Euro 2020 final defeat by Italy.
